title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 81.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 81.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part: (a) The term agency shall mean any agency of
a foreign banking corporation licensed pursuant to article II of the Banking

Law. (b) The term
large-denomination obligation shall mean any obligation, evidenced by a
promissory note, a certificate of deposit, a statement, or a book entry, in the
amount of $100,000 or more. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
81.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
